hymn.title: Remove the veils, Lord, from my heart

layout.singingstanza: Re -- move the veils, Lord, from my heart; True rev -- e -- la -- tion grant to me; A vi -- sion clear, O Lord, im -- part Of Thy re -- cov -- er -- y. Of Thy re -- cov -- er -- y. Of Thy re -- cov -- er -- y. A vi -- sion clear, O Lord, im -- part Of Thy re -- cov -- er -- y.

lyrics.stanza: By revelation I perceive The power that raised Christ from the dead; When I by faith this power receive, I to the church am led.
Thy mighty power has set me free From all the world's distracting things; An entrance to the local church This mighty power brings.
Once in the local church, I need To take Thee as my person, Lord; My outward man each day recede, My heart is for the Lord.
When all Thy members self forsake, Thy glorious Body, Lord, is known; When of Thy Person we partake, The one new man is shown.
The church life is the one new man In every local church expressed; Thy Body is a corporate man, One Person manifest.
(Repeat the last two lines of each stanza)
